overview: Mike has been innovating in the automotive space since the 1990’s. As an executive for 2009 TechCrunch 50 finalist Mota Motors he defined and deployed products for strategic partners like AutoTrader.com and eBay Motors; as inventor and co-founder of ControlBox.com, he conceived of the tools that will ultimately help to end private party fraud on online marketplaces. Mike’s most recent endeavor, RollSale, is a disruptive disintermediation of the used car supply chain that promises to become the superhighway of automotive wholesale activity.
